prompt: Create a recently viewed products page with a vibrant gradient background (from light blue to white) and a white app bar with the title 'Recently Viewed' in bold black text. The page should display a vertically scrollable list of product cards with sharp rectangular edges and no shadow. Each card should have a light blue background, featuring a square product image placeholder (white with a grey shopping bag icon) on the right, with product details on the left. The product details should include the product name in bold black text, a short description in grey text, the current price in bold orange, and the original price crossed out in red. Place an 'Add to Cart' button with an orange background and white text at the top right of each card. Use moderate padding for a balanced layout.
